name: DataFast
tagline: Revenue-first analytics
description: Discover which marketing channels bring customers so you can grow your business, fast.

name: kuku
tagline: Obsidian — but a lot has changed
description: Kuku is a truly native, local-first markdown editor for macOS — built with Tauri, not Electron. Notes are stored as plainmd files with wikilinks, backlinks, and graph view. Its AI agent doesn’t just chat — it searches, edits, and links your files, with every change shown as Cursor-style diffs you can review. Fast, lightweight, offline-first. No cloud. No lock-in. Obsidian + Cursor, without Electron.

name: Imagine
tagline: Build something real with the most complete AI builder
description: The most complete AI builder ever made. With Imagine, you turn your ideas into functional products by chatting with AI. No matter your prompt, your applications will always have: - Built-in cloud: Auth, Databases, Storage, Notifications, Hosting - Fullest compliance: GDPR, HIPAA, SOC 2, CCPA - SSR and server functions, enabling fast load times and strong SEO - Highest security: DDoS, Abuse protection, Encryption, Data migrations - Scalability: Completely managed cloud infrastructure

name: Rumora
tagline: Promote your brand in viral TikTok & YouTube videos
description: Rumora finds viral videos in your niche and places your brand naturally in the top comments. As videos blow up, users see your name, Google it, and convert at 3x higher rates than ads. Now with full TikTok support. 100k+ reach in 7 days, guaranteed.

name: AutoSend
tagline: Email for Developers, Marketers, and AI Agents
description: AutoSend is an email platform for developers who need reliable transactional and marketing emails without pricing headaches.

name: minimalist phone app for iOS
tagline: Your calmer, digital detox experience on iPhone
description: Imagine saving 80 hours/month. That’s nearly $3,000 you’d normally get for work instead of mindlessly scrolling. minimalist phone brings a true digital detox to iOS with a clean, blank-screen design. Block addictive apps, remove colourful icons, and get kicked out of your phone when time is up. Reclaim focus, improve well-being, and spend more time offline with people you love. The app is also for people with ADHD.

name: Unlimited eSign for founders by Gitlaw
tagline: No trials. No caps. Just sign.
description: Free eSign with no trials or document limits. Draft contracts with AI, review them, and sign – all in one workflow. Depending which plan you compare - save $100's or $1000's vs. DocuSign / HelloSign etc.

name: Kimi K2.5
tagline: Native multimodal model with self-directed agent swarms
description: Kimi K2.5 is Kimi's most intelligent model to date, achieving open-source SoTA performance in Agent, code, visual understanding, and a range of general intelligent tasks. It is also Kimi's most versatile model to date, featuring a native multimodal architecture that supports both visual and text input, thinking and non-thinking modes, and dialogue and Agent tasks.

name: Prism
tagline: A free, LaTeX-native workspace for scientists
description: Introducing Prism, a free workspace for scientists to write and collaborate on research, powered by GPT-5.2.

name: Polyglotta
tagline: Translate and learn many languages at once
description: Multilingual translator and language learner AI agent — made for people who speak, think, and learn across more than one language.

name: What’s in that direction?
tagline: A compass that shows landmarks, sunrise/sunset + golden hour
description: Miss when apps were simple and fun? This one's for you! Here's a playful way to discover what's ahead, whatever direction you point your phone in. This compass app shows you places of interest (famous, unusual or local) in your line of sight. It also includes the location and time of sunset and sunrise as well as the current sun position. See the world in a new way. And have some fun. Whether you're in on a trip or just standing in your backyard.

name: employkids
tagline: Hire your kids so they can retire millionaires
description: The IRS lets you pay your kids for real work. That income can go into a Roth IRA and grow tax-free. $4k/year from age 10-18 becomes over $1M by retirement. The catch? Paperwork. Agreements, work logs, payment records. Most parents never bother because it's annoying. We make it easy.

name: DunSocial
tagline: Social post writer that learns your tone + schedules for you
description: Stop re-explaining your brand to AI every time. DunSocial remembers your voice, audience, and context — then creates platform-perfect content in seconds

name: NetNewsWire 7
tagline: Free and open source RSS reader for Mac, iPhone, and iPad
description: NetNewsWire is a free and open source RSS reader. It's fast, stable, and accessible. NetNewsWire shows you articles from your favorite blogs and news sites - and keeps track of what you've read. If you've been going from page to page in your browser looking for new articles to read, let NetNewsWire bring them to you instead. It's easy and fun - and it puts you in control of your news.

name: Komo Playbook
tagline: Turn your expertise into AI agents that work 24/7
description: Excited to introduce Komo Playbook, The First AI operations platform. Teach it once—with an SOP, screen recording, or plain English. No code. No canvas wiring. It reasons through exceptions, and runs your business workflow 24/7.

name: PopStack
tagline: Dock-style folder popovers for your macOS Desktop
description: Desktop Stacks, reimagined. Instant folder popovers for a cleaner, faster Mac experience.

name: Edit Mind
tagline: AI-Powered Local Video Search & Analysis
description: A project built to help you transcribe, analayze and index your personal video library to help you search for the "exact" part of the video you're looking for with the help of local ML models and a local vector database. Your videos will never leave your computer or server (Docker support).

name: DevLensPro
tagline: AI-powered debugging for Claude Code. Point, click, fix
description: DevLensPro is a Chrome extension that bridges your browser with Claude Code. Point at any UI element, and Claude instantly understands the context—CSS, HTML, console logs, React components, screenshots—and fixes bugs automatically. It eliminates the back-and-forth of describing UI issues. Works with the MCP protocol for seamless integration. 100% local, open source, and privacy-first.

name: Cloakly
tagline: Hide apps during screen shares – keep your desktop private
description: Cloakly is a lightweight Windows app that lets you hide sensitive windows like personal messages, banking tabs, or distractions during screen shares on Zoom, Teams, Discord, or OBS. Unlike basic workarounds like alt-tabbing or virtual desktops, hidden apps stay fully usable and visible only to you, no interruptions to your workflow.

name: dumppp
tagline: .5s capture app that sends your notes straight into Notion
description: A blazing fast Notion frontend to capture and review ideas in under 0.5s. It eliminates loading friction with an X-like timeline and a Tab UI context switcher. Instantly swap databases and properties for both viewing and writing. Features offline-first capture and a direct-API design for total privacy. Refined by 70+ beta testers (90.5% Reddit upvote ratio) to keep pace with your creative flow.
